channel.title: Comments on: Setting up the stand

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p> <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif"</a> /> I gather from Twitter that you won the breakout technology award. Congrats!! Dad says where is the Co. Sec going out to dinner?<br />Hope this is good news for business<br /><br />Have a great time and wow them with the presentations!</p>
item.content:encoded:
http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif“ /> I gather from Twitter that you won the breakout technology award. Congrats!! Dad says where is the Co. Sec going out to dinner?
Hope this is good news for business

Have a great time and wow them with the presentations!
